title: Who is Weird Al Yankovic? - Quora

response.answer_text: Weird Al Yankovic is a singer/songwriter/performer who has made his name for over 40 years now doing parodies of current or recent hits and in some cases writing his own humourous songs. My introduction to weird all came around 1982–1983 on Doctor Demento’s radio show. Dr. Demento - Wikipedia His show, which was broadcast on Westwood One and I picked it up on a Canadian rock station in Toronto. Dr. Demento’s show featured funny songs, skits, etc. from the past and present. This is the show that pretty much introduced the world to Weird Al. At this time, Weird Al’s output consisted of him singing and accompanying himself on accordion. Check these early Weird Al hits:   His popularity grew and so do his production values and he started making outstanding quality videos and parody songs. I would remember “back in the day” when a hit song was on every radio station thinking “What’s Weird Al gonna do with this?” Sure enough here are two of the biggest Weird Al parodies from the MTV eighties…   However, I think his Magnum Opus is “I’m Fat”

He is a guy who takes famous people's songs and makes fun of them by changing the song title and lyrics to make them funny ..over the years he's been doing this and many people have laughed and liked his versions of the songs he's made fun off..he took Michael Jackson beat it song and made funny version eat it check it out on utube you'll laugh ..hes done this with many singers songs over the years he's really good at making fun of songs to ..
